setDetails.setDescription: The Merge Index is part of Galleon's thematic Portfolios suite allowing holders of $MERGE to capture the upside in the highly anticipated event surrounding the upcoming merge on Ethereum, moving the entire network to Proof of Stake (PoS).
setDetails.managerDescription: Galleon is a guild of investment product methodologists that research, design, and create best-in-class, novel structured products.
